name: The Old West Savior
description:
The old west used to be a calm and safe place to live, under the protection of the great Sheriff. Suddenly, bandits appeared and dominated all the Old West. Be a hero and save the old west from the bandits!

In this game, you play as the sheriff in a beautiful hand-made pixel art world, with different scenarios, enemies, obstacles and bosses. Your goal is to defeat all enemies in 30 different levels, and save the Old West.

The game has:
> 30 lovely levels. Each level has a different scenario, with new deadly traps and enemies. The levels are big with a beautiful pixel art style.

> 4 different types of guns and 6 different items that can be bought in the shop, using the game coins. Use the guns and items to improve yourself in the game.

> Regular difficulty - the game is difficult and have a lot of hard levels, but its not impossible to be concluded - everyone can play it and have a lot of fun.

> There are 3 different enemies, a lot of traps, 2 bossfights, and 5 different hand-made scenarios.

> Cool soundtrack - The game has a very big and completed soundtrack, with a new music for each level.
